00003 /* Common Config Parser */
00004 
00005 #ifndef CUPL_CFG_H
00006 #define CUPL_CFG_H
00007 
00008 #define INVALID (((ch < 32) && (ch != '\t')) || (ch > 126))
00009 #define IDENTIFIER ((ch < 65) || ((ch > 90) && (ch < 97)) || (ch > 122))
00010 #define SEPERATOR ((ch == ' ') || (ch == '=') || (ch == '\t'))
00011 #define END_OF_LINE (ch == '\0')
00012 #define USELESS_LINE ((ch == '#') || (ch == ';') || (ch == ' ') || (ch == '\n'))
00013
